dict.acceptation: 储蓄，存款；保证金；沉淀物；寄存，寄存品；
储蓄；寄存；放置，安置；付保证金；

sent.orig: Deposit-dip-spin(DDS) coating method,a composite nano-powder sample preparation method for atomic force microscope(AFM) measurement is introduced.
sent.trans: 介绍了一种改进旋涂法——DDS涂膜法(Deposit-Dip-Spin-coating),主要用来制备纳米粉体原子力显微镜(AFM)分析样品。

sent.orig: A: We term deposit, notice deposit and current deposit in our bank.
sent.trans: A:我行有定活两便、通知存款、活期存款，您喜欢哪一个？

sent.orig: B: We have term deposit, notice deposit and current deposit here? Which one would you like?
sent.trans: B:我们这儿有定活两便，通知存款和活期存款，您打算选哪一种呢？

sent.orig: The Xiaoshimen silver-deposit deposit newly discovered which located in southwest of the Xiaosigou porphyry copper-molybdenum deposit.
sent.trans: 河北小石门银金矿床位于小寺沟斑岩铜钼矿床的南西侧。

sent.orig: The main gold ore deposit types are volcanic hydrothermal ore deposit and ductile shear-zone deposit.
sent.trans: 金矿主要为火山热液型和与韧性剪切带有关的金矿类型。
